features: CONCEPT: The Rock is a pant with a mountaineering design, offered in a broad range of colors. Made with two types of fabric, it allows you to reliably handle a wide range of situations.

FABRICS: Made with K-Stretch fabric with DWR treatment to help repel water and dirt from the surface of the fabric. Kortec reinforcements at the bottom for greater wear resistance. Upper front and lower back in one-way stretch fabric. Two-way stretch fabric on knee and back. The crotch design allows for great freedom of movement. All the zippers are YKK®.
Elastic waistband with logo elastic on the inside, adjustable with a stretch draw cord on the outside.
Pockets with Vislon® zip with garage for faster opening.
Invisible zip to open front flap.
Elastic gripper at bottom of pant.
